artefact.overview: Check how many hours of Driver CPC periodic training you’ve done and which courses you’ve attended
artefact.more_information:
##Training not showing on your record

Contact the training centre if training you’ve done isn't showing on your record after 5 working days. 

Email the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) if the training centre can’t help you.

$C

**DSA Driver CPC helpline**

<dcpc.complaints@dsa.gsi.gov.uk>

$C

##Register as a new user

You need to [register to use the service](https://dsa.dft.gov.uk/cpcode/flow/user?register=yes "Register to check your Driver CPC periodic training record"){:rel="external"} if you’re a new user. You’ll need to give your:

- driving licence number
- home postcode

A password for the service will be sent by post to the address on your driving licence. 

*[CPC]: Certificate of Professional Competence
*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
